targets.rawSql:
SELECT block,
  price
FROM (
  SELECT block,
    price
  FROM ethereum.block_price
  ORDER BY block DESC
  LIMIT 1000
)
ORDER BY block;

SELECT block_timestamp, 
  CASE WHEN predict_result < 0
    THEN 0
    ELSE ROUND(predict_result * 100, 0)
  END
FROM ethereum.model_prediction;

SELECT CASE WHEN predict_result < 0
  THEN 0
  ELSE ROUND(predict_result * 100, 0)
  END
FROM ethereum.model_prediction
ORDER BY block_timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

WITH T AS (  
  SELECT date_bin('$bucket_interval', block_timestamp, TIMESTAMP '2001-01-01') AS block_timestamp,
    block,
    price
  FROM ethereum.block_price
)
SELECT MMV.block_timestamp,
  O.price as open,
  high,
  low,
  C.price as close,
  AVG(C.price) OVER (ORDER BY C.block ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS MA7,
  AVG(C.price) OVER (ORDER BY C.block ROWS BETWEEN 24 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS MA25,
  AVG(C.price) OVER (ORDER BY C.block ROWS BETWEEN 98 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS MA99
FROM
  (
    SELECT block_timestamp,
      MAX(price) AS high,
      MIN(price) AS low
    FROM T
    GROUP BY block_timestamp
  ) MMV,
  (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (block_timestamp) block_timestamp, block, price
    FROM T
    ORDER BY block_timestamp, block DESC
  ) C,
  (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (block_timestamp) block_timestamp, block, price
    FROM T
    ORDER BY block_timestamp, block
  ) O
WHERE MMV.block_timestamp = C.block_timestamp AND MMV.block_timestamp = O.block_timestamp
ORDER BY MMV.block_timestamp
LIMIT 100000

WITH T AS (
  SELECT date_bin('$bucket_interval', block_timestamp, TIMESTAMP '2001-01-01') AS block_timestamp,
    SUM(transaction_count) AS transaction_count
  FROM ethereum.block_price
  GROUP BY date_bin('$bucket_interval', block_timestamp, TIMESTAMP '2001-01-01')
)
SELECT block_timestamp,
  AVG(transaction_count) OVER (ORDER BY block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN 7 PRECEDING AND 1 PRECEDING) AS transaction_count
FROM T;

WITH T AS (
  SELECT date_bin('$bucket_interval', block_timestamp, TIMESTAMP '2001-01-01') AS block_timestamp,
    SUM(burned_eth) AS burned_eth
  FROM ethereum.block_price
  GROUP BY date_bin('$bucket_interval', block_timestamp, TIMESTAMP '2001-01-01')
)
SELECT block_timestamp,
  AVG(burned_eth) OVER (ORDER BY block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN 7 PRECEDING AND 1 PRECEDING) AS burned_eth
FROM T;

WITH T AS (
  SELECT date_bin('$bucket_interval', block_timestamp, TIMESTAMP '2001-01-01') AS block_timestamp,
    block,
    static_rewards_eth,
    validator_withdrawals_eth,
    price
  FROM ethereum.block_price
),
TX AS (
  SELECT date_bin('$bucket_interval', block_timestamp, TIMESTAMP '2001-01-01') AS block_timestamp,
    SUM(tx_fees_eth) AS tx_fees_eth
  FROM ethereum.transactions
  GROUP BY date_bin('$bucket_interval', block_timestamp, TIMESTAMP '2001-01-01')
)
SELECT R.block_timestamp,
  AVG(static_rewards_eth) OVER (ORDER BY R.block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN 7 PRECEDING AND 1 PRECEDING) * price AS "Static Rewards",
  AVG(validator_withdrawals_eth) OVER (ORDER BY R.block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN 7 PRECEDING AND 1 PRECEDING) * price AS "Validator Withdrawals",
  TX.tx_fees_eth * price AS "Transaction Fees"
FROM TX,
  (
    SELECT block_timestamp,
      SUM(static_rewards_eth) AS static_rewards_eth,
      SUM(validator_withdrawals_eth) AS validator_withdrawals_eth
    FROM T
    GROUP BY block_timestamp
  ) R,
  (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (block_timestamp) block_timestamp, block, price
    FROM T
    ORDER BY block_timestamp, block DESC
  ) C
WHERE R.block_timestamp = C.block_timestamp AND R.block_timestamp = TX.block_timestamp

WITH T AS (
  SELECT date_bin('$bucket_interval', block_timestamp, TIMESTAMP '2001-01-01') AS block_timestamp,
    SUM(volume_eth) AS volume
  FROM ethereum.transactions
  GROUP BY date_bin('$bucket_interval', block_timestamp, TIMESTAMP '2001-01-01')
),
BP AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (block_timestamp) block_timestamp, block, price
  FROM (
    SELECT date_bin('$bucket_interval', block_timestamp, TIMESTAMP '2001-01-01') AS block_timestamp,
      block,
      price
    FROM ethereum.block_price
  )
  ORDER BY block_timestamp, block DESC
)
SELECT T.block_timestamp,
  AVG(volume) OVER (ORDER BY T.block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) * price AS volume
FROM T, BP
WHERE T.block_timestamp = BP.block_timestamp;

WITH T AS (
  SELECT date_bin('$bucket_interval', block_timestamp, TIMESTAMP '2001-01-01') AS block_timestamp,
    SUM(active_address) AS active_address
  FROM ethereum.transactions
  GROUP BY date_bin('$bucket_interval', block_timestamp, TIMESTAMP '2001-01-01')
)
SELECT block_timestamp,
  AVG(active_address) OVER (ORDER BY block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS active_address
FROM T;

WITH T AS (
  SELECT date_bin('$bucket_interval', block_timestamp, TIMESTAMP '2001-01-01') AS block_timestamp,
    SUM(avg_gas_price_gwei) AS avg_gas_price_gwei
  FROM ethereum.transactions
  GROUP BY date_bin('$bucket_interval', block_timestamp, TIMESTAMP '2001-01-01')
)
SELECT block_timestamp,
  AVG(avg_gas_price_gwei) OVER (ORDER BY block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS avg_gas_price_gwei
FROM T;

WITH T AS (
  SELECT date_bin('$bucket_interval', block_timestamp, TIMESTAMP '2001-01-01') AS block_timestamp,
    AVG(size) AS size
  FROM ethereum.block_price
  GROUP BY date_bin('$bucket_interval', block_timestamp, TIMESTAMP '2001-01-01')
)
SELECT
  AVG(size) OVER (ORDER BY block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW)
FROM T
ORDER BY block_timestamp
LIMIT 100000;

WITH T AS (
  SELECT date_bin('$bucket_interval', block_timestamp, TIMESTAMP '2001-01-01') AS block_timestamp,
    AVG(CAST(gas_used_wei AS DECIMAL(14,2)) / CAST(gas_limit_wei AS DECIMAL(14,2))) AS gas_used_percentage
  FROM ethereum.block_price
  GROUP BY date_bin('$bucket_interval', block_timestamp, TIMESTAMP '2001-01-01')
)
SELECT
  AVG(gas_used_percentage) OVER (ORDER BY block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW)
FROM T
ORDER BY block_timestamp
LIMIT 100000;

WITH T AS (
  SELECT date_bin('$bucket_interval', block_timestamp, TIMESTAMP '2001-01-01') AS block_timestamp,
    AVG(base_fee_per_gas_gwei) AS base_fee_per_gas_gwei
  FROM ethereum.block_price
  GROUP BY date_bin('$bucket_interval', block_timestamp, TIMESTAMP '2001-01-01')
)
SELECT
  AVG(base_fee_per_gas_gwei) OVER (ORDER BY block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW)
FROM T
ORDER BY block_timestamp
LIMIT 100000;

WITH T AS (  
  SELECT date_bin('$bucket_interval', block_timestamp, TIMESTAMP '2001-01-01') AS block_timestamp,
    block,
    price
  FROM ethereum.block_price
),
OHLC AS (
  SELECT MMV.block_timestamp,
    O.price as open,
    high,
    low,
    C.price as close
  FROM
    (
      SELECT block_timestamp,
        MAX(price) AS high,
        MIN(price) AS low
      FROM T
      GROUP BY block_timestamp
    ) MMV,
    (
      SELECT DISTINCT ON (block_timestamp) block_timestamp, block, price
      FROM T
      ORDER BY block_timestamp, block DESC
    ) C,
    (
      SELECT DISTINCT ON (block_timestamp) block_timestamp, block, price
      FROM T
      ORDER BY block_timestamp, block
    ) O
  WHERE MMV.block_timestamp = C.block_timestamp AND MMV.block_timestamp = O.block_timestamp
  ORDER BY MMV.block_timestamp
  LIMIT 100000
),
ICHIMOKU AS (
  SELECT block_timestamp,
    (MAX(close) OVER (ORDER BY block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN $tenkan_periods - 1 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) + 
      MIN(close) OVER (ORDER BY block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN $tenkan_periods - 1 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW)) / 2 
      AS "Tenkan Sen",
    (MAX(close) OVER (ORDER BY block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN $kijun_periods - 1 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) + 
      MIN(close) OVER (ORDER BY block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN $kijun_periods - 1 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW)) / 2 
      AS "Kijun Sen",
    (MAX(close) OVER (ORDER BY block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN $senkou_b_periods - 1 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) + 
      MIN(close) OVER (ORDER BY block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN $senkou_b_periods - 1 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW)) / 2 
      AS "Senkou Span B",
    LEAD(close, $kijun_periods) OVER (ORDER BY block_timestamp) AS "Chikou Span"
  FROM OHLC
)
SELECT OHLC.block_timestamp, open, high, low, close,
  "Tenkan Sen", "Kijun Sen", ("Tenkan Sen" + "Kijun Sen") / 2 AS "Senkou Span A", "Senkou Span B", "Chikou Span"
FROM OHLC, ICHIMOKU
WHERE OHLC.block_timestamp = ICHIMOKU.block_timestamp

WITH T AS (  
  SELECT date_bin('$bucket_interval', block_timestamp, TIMESTAMP '2001-01-01') AS block_timestamp,
    block,
    price
  FROM ethereum.block_price
),
OHLC AS (
  SELECT MMV.block_timestamp,
    O.price as open,
    high,
    low,
    C.price as close
  FROM
    (
      SELECT block_timestamp,
        MAX(price) AS high,
        MIN(price) AS low
      FROM T
      GROUP BY block_timestamp
    ) MMV,
    (
      SELECT DISTINCT ON (block_timestamp) block_timestamp, block, price
      FROM T
      ORDER BY block_timestamp, block DESC
    ) C,
    (
      SELECT DISTINCT ON (block_timestamp) block_timestamp, block, price
      FROM T
      ORDER BY block_timestamp, block
    ) O
  WHERE MMV.block_timestamp = C.block_timestamp AND MMV.block_timestamp = O.block_timestamp
  ORDER BY MMV.block_timestamp
  LIMIT 100000
),
MACD AS (
  SELECT block_timestamp,
    (close - AVG(close) OVER (ORDER BY block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN $macd_fast_periods PRECEDING AND 1 PRECEDING)) * 
      ($macd_smooth_factor / (1 + $macd_fast_periods)) + 
      AVG(close) OVER (ORDER BY block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN $macd_fast_periods PRECEDING AND 1 PRECEDING)
    AS fast_ema,
    (close - AVG(close) OVER (ORDER BY block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN $macd_slow_periods PRECEDING AND 1 PRECEDING)) * 
      ($macd_smooth_factor / (1 + $macd_slow_periods)) +
      AVG(close) OVER (ORDER BY block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN $macd_slow_periods PRECEDING AND 1 PRECEDING)
    AS slow_ema
  FROM OHLC
)
SELECT OHLC.block_timestamp, open, high, low, close, 
  fast_ema - slow_ema AS "MACD",
  (fast_ema - slow_ema - AVG(fast_ema - slow_ema) OVER (ORDER BY OHLC.block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN $macd_signal_periods PRECEDING AND 1 PRECEDING)) * 
    ($macd_smooth_factor / (1 + $macd_signal_periods)) +
    AVG(fast_ema - slow_ema) OVER (ORDER BY OHLC.block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN $macd_signal_periods PRECEDING AND 1 PRECEDING)
  AS "Signal Line"
FROM OHLC, MACD
WHERE OHLC.block_timestamp = MACD.block_timestamp

WITH C AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (block_timestamp) block_timestamp, 
    block, 
    price AS close
  FROM (
    SELECT date_bin('$bucket_interval', block_timestamp, TIMESTAMP '2001-01-01') AS block_timestamp,
      block,
      price
    FROM ethereum.block_price
  )
  ORDER BY block_timestamp, block DESC
  LIMIT 100000
),
EMA AS (
  SELECT block_timestamp,
    (close - AVG(close) OVER (ORDER BY block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN $macd_fast_periods PRECEDING AND 1 PRECEDING)) * 
      ($macd_smooth_factor / (1 + $macd_fast_periods)) + 
      AVG(close) OVER (ORDER BY block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN $macd_fast_periods PRECEDING AND 1 PRECEDING)
    AS fast_ema,
    (close - AVG(close) OVER (ORDER BY block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN $macd_slow_periods PRECEDING AND 1 PRECEDING)) * 
      ($macd_smooth_factor / (1 + $macd_slow_periods)) +
      AVG(close) OVER (ORDER BY block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN $macd_slow_periods PRECEDING AND 1 PRECEDING)
    AS slow_ema
  FROM C
),
MACD AS (
  SELECT C.block_timestamp,
    fast_ema - slow_ema AS macd,
    (fast_ema - slow_ema - AVG(fast_ema - slow_ema) OVER (ORDER BY C.block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN $macd_signal_periods PRECEDING AND 1 PRECEDING)) * 
      ($macd_smooth_factor / (1 + $macd_signal_periods)) +
      AVG(fast_ema - slow_ema) OVER (ORDER BY C.block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN $macd_signal_periods PRECEDING AND 1 PRECEDING)
    AS signal_line
  FROM C, EMA
  WHERE C.block_timestamp = EMA.block_timestamp
)
SELECT MACD.block_timestamp, 
  pos_diff AS "Positive Difference", neg_diff AS "Negative Difference"
FROM MACD
  LEFT JOIN
  (
    SELECT block_timestamp,
      macd - signal_line AS pos_diff
    FROM MACD
    WHERE macd - signal_line > 0
  ) POS
  ON MACD.block_timestamp = POS.block_timestamp
  LEFT JOIN
  (
    SELECT block_timestamp,
      macd - signal_line AS neg_diff
    FROM MACD
    WHERE macd - signal_line < 0
  ) NEG
  ON MACD.block_timestamp = NEG.block_timestamp

WITH T AS (  
  SELECT date_bin('$bucket_interval', block_timestamp, TIMESTAMP '2001-01-01') AS block_timestamp,
    block,
    price
  FROM ethereum.block_price
),
OHLC AS (
  SELECT MMV.block_timestamp,
    O.price as open,
    high,
    low,
    C.price as close
  FROM
    (
      SELECT block_timestamp,
        MAX(price) AS high,
        MIN(price) AS low
      FROM T
      GROUP BY block_timestamp
    ) MMV,
    (
      SELECT DISTINCT ON (block_timestamp) block_timestamp, block, price
      FROM T
      ORDER BY block_timestamp, block DESC
    ) C,
    (
      SELECT DISTINCT ON (block_timestamp) block_timestamp, block, price
      FROM T
      ORDER BY block_timestamp, block
    ) O
  WHERE MMV.block_timestamp = C.block_timestamp AND MMV.block_timestamp = O.block_timestamp
  ORDER BY MMV.block_timestamp
  LIMIT 100000
)
SELECT OHLC.block_timestamp, open, high, low, close,
  AVG(close) OVER (ORDER BY block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN $jaw_periods + $jaw_offset PRECEDING AND $jaw_offset PRECEDING) AS "Jaw",
  AVG(close) OVER (ORDER BY block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN $teeth_periods + $teeth_offset PRECEDING AND $teeth_offset PRECEDING) AS "Teeth",
  AVG(close) OVER (ORDER BY block_timestamp ROWS BETWEEN $lip_periods + $lip_offset PRECEDING AND $lip_offset PRECEDING) AS "Lips"
FROM OHLC

SELECT *
FROM
  ethereum.block_price
ORDER BY block DESC
LIMIT 5;

SELECT block_timestamp, avg_gas_price_gwei, tx_fees_eth, volume_eth, active_address
FROM
  ethereum.transactions
ORDER BY minute_group_id DESC
LIMIT 5;
